subject: Good day ,
body:
Good day ,
I have received your message Your money is in a suspense account You should contact him through his contact email below:
Mr. Thomas Vemasket (Remittance Director)
Téléphone: (+229) 692 888 11
Email:   (
thomas.vemaske@collector.org
)
This is your Transaction Reference Number: BV018/601XXDE/012. You must send it to him so that he will recognize and approve your claim to release your money, US$1.5 Million  to you.
Also 
send him your personal information,
FULL NAME: ==============
COUNTRY: ==============
CITY: ==============
CURRENT HOME ADDRESS: ===========
TELEPHONE/CELL PHONE NUMBER.=========
A COPY OF YOUR IDENTIFICATION
: ===============
Contact Mr.Thomas Vemasket, immediately and send your Transaction Reference Number: BV018/601XXDE/012 with your personal information.
Please remember to keep my communication with you secret, do not let them  know that you got this secret information from me otherwise I will lose my job and be killed. I like Jewish people, and I am under the Order of tribe of Judah. Please do not disappoint me, I am doing this to help you to receive your money. because i will not be here and allow anything to happen to the money of Jewish person,
Let me know as soon as you receive a reply from him,
Regards,
Mrs, Susan Ledmark.

subject: Re: Good day ,
body:
Hello Mrs. Susan Ledmark,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're having a good day too. I received your message and I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

What exactly is the remittance director, Mr. Thomas Vemasket, responsible for? And how does he play a role in helping me receive my money? Also, what is the purpose of sending him my personal telephone cell phone number and a copy of my contact information?

I understand that you mentioned keeping this secret from others, but could you please explain why it's important to keep it confidential? I want to make sure I fully understand the situation before proceeding.

Thank you again for reaching out to me, Mrs. Ledmark. I look forward to hearing back from you with more details.

Best wishes,
Jutta
